{
    "name": "Plebanski-Demianski Metric: Rotating, Charged, and Asymptotically Flat Spacetime",
    "abbrev": "plebanskiDemianski",
    "description": "A solution to the Einstein-Maxwell equations describing a rotating, charged, and asymptotically flat spacetime, used to model black holes and their properties.",
    
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,
    
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Cartesian",
            "xlineElement": "(-dt^2 + (1-2M/r)*(dx^2+dy^2+dz^2)+(1-2M/r)*((r^2+m^2)/((r^2+m^2)^2+(e*Q)^2)*dφ^2)+2*(e*Q)*m/r^3*(dt*dφ)-(e*Q)^2*m^2/r^6*dφ^2)",
            "validated": false,
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"],
    "diagrams": []
}[0m
